a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual working hours per worker, various sources, France
Comparison of various sources of annual working hours estimates. Note that not all sources publish data for every
Data source: Bick et al (2019) and other sources
Note: OECD data refers to average annual hours actually worked per worker; PWT data refers to average annual hours worked by
persons engaged; Bick et al data refers to average annual hours worked per employed person; Huberman & Minns data refers to annual
hours of full-time production workers (male and female) in non-agricultural activities
